chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: Teiid provides several capabilities for caching data including: materialized views, result set caching, and code table caching. Â These can be used to significantly improve performance in many situations.

section.title: Cache Hint
section.para: Non-update user commands may be preceded with a cache hint, e.g. /*+ cache */ select ..., to inform the engine that the results of command should be cached. The scope of the result, either session or global, will be deteremined automatically from the determinism level of the source queries and functions executed.
ResultSet caching must be enabled for this hint to have an effect.
